title.rendered: SD6AW230-HNI Dahua 2 Megapixel Network IR PTZ Dome Camera

content.rendered:
Make Dahua Technology
Manufacturer Dahua Technology Ltd
Model code DH-SD6AW230-HNI
Series Ultra-smart Series
Chip Inch Size 1/3 inch
Colour Type Colour / Monochrome
Resolution TVL 2 MP TVL resolution
HD Yes
Megapixel Yes
Dome Type PTZ
Sensitivity lux 0.005 lux
Pan Speed o/ sec Manual: 0.1 ~ 200 o/ sec pan speed
Digital (DSP) Yes
Tilt Speed o/ sec Manual: 0.1 ~ 120 o/ sec tilt speed
Electrical Specifications Voltage: 24 V AC
Power Consumption: 20 W
Focal length 4.3 ~ 129 mm
Presets 80
Compression H.264/MJPEG
Back Light Compensation Yes
Auto Gain Control Yes
White Balance Yes
Electronic Shutter range 1/1 ~ 1/30,000s
S/ N (Signal/ Noise) Ratio dB >50
Built-in IR LED Yes
Video Output BNC(1.0Vp-p/75Ohm)
Zoom Ratio x16
Network Properties Interface: RJ-45 (10/100Base-T)
Network Protocols: IPv4/ IPv6, HTTP, HTTPS, SSL, TCP/IP, UDP, UPnP, ICMP, IGMP, SNMP, RTSP, RTP, SMTP, NTP, DHCP, DNS, PPPOE, DDNS, FTP, IP Filter, QoS, Bonjour, 802.1x
Control: PTZ
Image Frame Rate: 30fps
Inclusive DVR/ Web Server: Micro SD
Physical Specifications Dimensions mm: 252 x 385
Weight g: 6,750
Environmental Specifications Operating Temp oC: -40 ~ +70 C (-40 ~ +158 F)
Operating Humidity %: <90
Protection: IP66

excerpt.rendered:
Dahua Technology DH-SD6AW230-HNI is a 2 megapixel network IR PTZ dome camera that features:

  • Powerful30x optical zoom
  • Support Triple-streams encoding
  • Max 50/60fps@720P and 25/30fps@1080P resolution
  • Defog, DWDR, Day/Night(ICR), Ultra DNR, EIS, Auto iris, Auto focus
  • Support Wipe
  • Multiple network monitoring: Web viewer, CMS(DSS/PSS) & DMSS
  • Max 240°/s pan speed, 360° endless pan rotation
  • Up to 255 presets, 5 auto scan, 8 tour, 5 pattern
  • Built-in 7/2 alarm in/out
